review: I really wanted to like Chromecast and was excited to get it in. The instructions made it seem like setup should be rather easy, but it took me sifting through forums on router setting configurations for Chromecast to get it to finally connect. Now the setup is easy, but Chromecast decides to disconnect about once a week, and doesn't work seamlessly with most of the apps on my smartphone. I like it well enough when it works, but it has enough issues to be frustrating. Streaming from the chrome tab from my PC works much more consistently than the smartphone apps.
